long_description: This mod ensures that no players use auto-clickers. You can only place a block every 0.16 seconds. It is especially suitable for servers like Capture the Flag, where quickly placing blocks can provide a significant advantage.
name: click_speed_detector
short_description: A mod that ensures you can only place a node every 0.16 seconds. It is intended for servers to counter players using auto-clickers.
title: Click Speed Detector
